I don't care for anyone else and the rest of you can fuck off and leave me the fuck alone forever.

like a bird, time just flies away

all that's in the end

So this past week has been shitty. Since Joe did what he did, him and I are no longer friends which sucks but thats the way it has to be. That day Kelly called her father and told him the story. Russ said to call the police but I fought against it and kept Joe's ass out of prison. Russ yelled at me telling me that "He was going to eat my fucking liver", I have never heard this man say the word fuck. After that I was stewing for a few days. When I went to grandma's house the other day is when I started to tell Kelly the way I was feeling about it all. Everything was fine at my grandma's but then on the way home Kelly and I started fighting again and it only got worse. Once we got home I was fixing the wall in the kitchen and I let it all come out. I said somethings about Kelly's family that I didn't mean and I won't ever say again because I didn't mean them, I was just talking shit. I ripped out Kelly's insides and stomped all over them with the things that I said and I almost lost her over it. I'm kissing major ass now, I made her a candle light dinner last night and breakfast this morning. Kelly says that I need to change back to the old me and she's right. I'm going to change back to the old me before my father died, a happy me. I made a vow when I was little to never hit a woman and I stick to that but the other night I might as well have done it because I feel like I have with my words. Things seem to be getting better between her and I now. I have not yelled at her since that night and I will try my hardest to never yell at her again because she doesn't deserve it, at least not all the time like I was before. (which was everyday) I am going to go see the Megadeth show for sure. Kelly bought me two tickets, one for me and one for my little brother. I don't mind taking my little brother because he's alright, I don't have to worry about him at this concert because this place has seats. We're in the 7th row center which is where I want to be. Joe just remember that I saved you from being someones anal bitch for a long time O.K. The choice was not mine to end this friendship, it was an order from Russ. If you step foot on my property again, I am out of a place to live. Well that's the gist of it.




                                           Dairy of a Madman

Christ, have you seen this guy? Make ya sick, gonna peel away all the impurities
Cuz all you wanna do is keep curin' me, but I don't give a fuck I kill everyone 
You'll be mopping up blood and guts and all the shit when I'm done 
Isn't this fun? Gimme a gun and I'll tell you all the secrets I hide 
BEFORE I RUN!

Next time I see you mother fucker, You better run and hide. I'll be waiting in every shadow and lie in wait behind every turn. I'm coming for your ass and when the time comes, you'll know it cause it will hurt like hell and I will be the one pissing on your grave, What you did on MY computer was wrong and sick!!!!!!! You have some serious issues that need to be fixed and I'm just the one to do that. 
Next time I see your face I'm gonna put my fist through it so be forewarned.


                                      See you in hell Mother Fucker!!!!!

Where do we go from here?
And should we really care
The end is finally here
God have mercy!

Now we've rewtitten history
The one thing we've found out
Sweet taste of vindication
It turns to ashes in your mouth

Britain

An insane place, with insane moves
Battles without, for battles within
Where evil lives and evil rules

Kill many, and you're a conqueror
Kill them all ... Ooh ... Oh you're a God!

I just woke up at 1 am so I can go to work for WWE at 4am. I have to go to the arena to put in an 18 hour day. I assume that they will work me from 4 to noon then send me home for the show then after that they will probably want me back sometime after 10 pm to go pack the shit back up. Sometime in there I have to go to school so my day is fucked. I just took a Vivaran to keep my not so happy ass awake. I'm tired of everything, school, work, and all the things that follow. I keep saying that life is a game so play well, I just can't wait for the game over anymore. The one downfall to this job is that I go early as fuck to a site, put all this shit together just to came back a few hours later to put it back in the fucking boxes and send it back on the road. I think that I want a normal job, I don't really care what it is just a job that doesn't involve getting the shit kicked out of me. Kelly is at work till 6 am and I have to leave at 3:30. I'm having a panic attack for some reason and have been for the past few days. It won't let up, it's a constant struggle to stay happy anymore I and I don't want to fight anymore. All I look forward to is the end because everything ends and I'm just waiting for mine. The only good thing that I have is Kelly and while she does piss me off from time to time I would rather have her than not. I keep doing all these thing mostly to please her but mainly because it's what society wants and if I don't I lose. I never said that I want to loose the game I want to beat it and get the fuck out, I just wish that there was a few cheat codes to use. I don't use codes in games because it's considered cheating but in this game I wouldn't mind a few. Unlimited money, invincibility, and stamina wouldn't hurt. Something just doesn't feel right and I can't put my finger on it, but what ever the hell it is I wish it would correct itself. There it is, lets fucking play.

O.K, so Kelly has known that I've had to work WWE for the past month. I found out last week that the IN was set for 4am and I had no problem with that because I had a ride from her and everything was good. Tonight I find out that she has to work until 6 am that morning, FUCK THAT!!!! She's know for a month but when something for her comes up she drops everything in the world including me for what she wants. I'm not working for myself, It's all for you baby and you make it SOOOO fucking difficult. love you too honey.

well the other day I posted some shit here with some rules, FUCK 'EM (to some extent) Such as the pot, no problem. You want to call or come over and it's 11:30 pm, no problem. The things I said were just my way of trying to make things better and to just blow some steam. I just think that we need to use our heads a little more as a team. Please don't let this bother you guys more than I'm sure than it already has.
     Joe I called Emily and guess the fuck what, I got some paid training, 2 days of load in for Moving Out, a day of load out for Moving out, and WWE. Not to mention all the big mother fucking doors that this will open.I have some theatrical lighting experience and the training is for a little more.
     We need to play again soon too.

these are the new rules of the house. These rules are being set by me, not by Kelly. I don't want to hear anything bad out of either of your mouths about her.

1. No more pot at my house
2. I'm not here after 10 pm. (don't call or show)
3. on the weekends I'm not here after midnight
4. NEVER bad mouth Kelly in front of me, you might loose some teeth

 These are the new rules, You don't like the 'em, tough shit.


      X-New rules may be added in the future-x

so she shit upon the floor
wiped her ass on the knob of the door

Here I sit, broken hearted
Tried to shit but only farted

This is the way things have gone since my return home. I've been taking my medication (All of it) and I feel strange because of it. I can't get motivated anymore. Before I would be able to do things around the house and the like, with no problem, but now My body feels like I weigh a 1,000 pounds. There is no motivation and eventually things get done. The up-side is that I don't get angry with things that I use to, mainly the dumb shit.  
     I started school on Monday and it sucks for the most part but it's better than regular school so I can't complain. The things that suck about the school is that when we have our little 15 minute breaks I can't go outside to smoke. That would be nice and would help me out but what the hell can you do. The good thing about it is that it's only five hours a day, four days a week. No big deal I can do this!!! Today I only went for to school for two hours though. I didn't feel good at all today and I didn't do any thing around the house. I mostly laid in bed all day. 
     Jay is also at school with me. Thats a good thing because now we see each other everyday. Since school has started I've done coke twice and smoked just a about a bowl a day. I have to make what I have last, when Joe left I had about two bowls and Jay has brought some over a few times.Well that's it I'm done for now.

Well, today I start school. I just woke up and I have to have the rest of the house steam cleaned before I leave for school. I don't know if I have top walk to school yet or if I get a ride. Kelly gets off work at 4:30 and I have to leave here at 4:15 if I'm walking, school starts at 5:15. I have to call Emily at 3 and things around here are going to change for the better I think.
If you want the right lyrics for " Stoned & Drunk " go back into my posts and you'll find it somewhere in there. Just look hard and nice try.

Thanks for the helpful tips Ryan. When I get home from Texas I will put it to the test. The next thing that I'm going to try is to put either silly or silicone putty around the mouth piece and the bowl to insure the greatest seal, After that I plan to level out the ends and put some kind of fasteners to them also for the greatest seal. I'll call you when it's complete.

Well, Yesterday I took some weed out to my grandma's and my uncle's house. Uncle Al smoked weed with me as usual, but here is the kicker. I sat in my grandma's living room and smoked pot from Joe's scorpion while I watched "The Big Bounce". I pasted the pipe to my grandma like she was one of the gang and she reluctantly took it. Now what shocked me the most was when she asked, and I quote, " Does this mother fucker have a carb?" I nearly shit myself when she said that.
   After all that we all had a laughing fit because when I handed the pipe to her she made a joke about thinking there was a bug at the end of it and How one night someone will be stoned and think that there is a bug at the end of the pipe and DROP it. 
   On another note, I do miss Trish and although I did not cry in front or behind you all, I just held it back because someone had to keep they're shit together. I will mot lie, it was there but we all need to be strong and keep our shit straight.
   
     P.S. Fuck Captin' Willie;)

Sorry honey, I tried to do something nice and it had to get all fucked up. I've been outside cleaning since my last post and had to cut it short due to the MOTHER FUCKING BEE THAT STUNG ME IN THE BACK WHEN I WAS TRIMMING THE GOD DAMN TREE!!!!!!. Regaurdless I will have the yards done by wed.

I guess I already posted what I was addicted to before. I guess I forgot because I was pobably stoned like I'm about to get before I go out side and clean the yard. That would mean that If I start now' It will be done before Kelly wakes up and before the sun comes up.
    I just hope that I can make it to D&D today.

Well, this is almost the end of the pain-in-the-ass roommates. (for the time being)The plan is for tomorrow at 7 am, that they ship out for the long 14 hour drive which I have to make in august, and I may be able to make some of that drive if I get my permit this month. Anyways they will be gone within the next 2 days then Kelly won't have to fight with her brother and his old lady and that means that neither will I. I will be able to do what I want, when I want provided my wife lets me. haha thought that was pretty funny
    well that all I wanted to say so for now I'm gone. I'll post again tomorrow to keep everyone posted.



        Dairy of A Madman,

I'm tired as FUCK. I only slept about an hour and a half or so last night. Today was a big day, I went to the social security office this morning. I got there at ten and was out of there at eleven. (empty fuckin' handed). Then from there we went to Amphi high to see if they would give me my transcripts. After a little sweet talking from Kelly, she got her way but I'm not complaining. Not only did I get my transcipts for free but I got a withdrawal slip without the need of a parent signature.
  We came home after that and relaxed for a while. From there we went to Desert Rose to see if we could sweet talk them into letting me enroll without the need of a parent, but they were closed. We went to Ace Hardware to get some LYE to unclog our shower drain. I don't know how that stuff works yet, I haven't used it yet. 
   Then we went to Kelly's dentist. She made it sound like she had some serious damage that needed to get repaired but all they did was take out the other stitch. Now from there we went to Rhino to pick up my check. I'll tell you the rest later but now I have to go

Today I'm sore as shit. Pushing 2 ton boxes up a ramp is not that easy. Joe might not know what I'm talking about so much but those little lesbians pushing boxes 4 times their size into the backs of my heels really sucks. But anyways the show went great and I'm up for what ever is next.

    Dairy of a Madman.

Well, the first day went good. I didn't have one single problem. Yeah, I was just a pusher but you cant start at the top. Hopefully I will be in this job for the long run. ( an eagles song, haha ) I'm going into the office tomorrow to get some training lined up so that way in the future I can get more work than I can with being green and all. Tomorrow is another day, lets just see where it leads just for the fuck of it. You never know where life is heading but for me I'm just along for the ride till it comes to a stop.


               Dairy of a Madman.

Well, tonight is my first night of work for this company. Panic has set in but I'm not gonna let it win. I think all it is is that it's the first night. I have to be there at 11:00 pm so I have some time to let it set in. I'll be sure to post after the job is done. All it is, as Joe knows because he will be there too, is an out for The Eagles. Not too bad for my first gig. I'll let you all know later.

        Dairy of a Madman.

Last night I went out with Trish and Joe after the best sex Kelly and I have had if not in a long time, the best ever. When I went out, Carrie, as you all know is her little lezbo friend, came over sad and looking to get fucked up. Carrie has told me to my face that she likes girly girls, Kelly is a girly girl, and that If Carrie had the chance she would date Kelly. I trust Kelly 100%, But when I walked into our bedroom to find these two women in our bed, I was outraged. A lot of guys would probably say " score, I've got two girls in my bed" but I say NO.
       I don't know what the fuck went on, But I had to sleep in another room without my wife because she was in bed with another girl. When I know more I will post again.



SHHH!, You mother fuckers
 P.S.  Sorry about your pipe Joe

Well, Thanx Joe for all that you have done for me over the past few days. I hope that you listen to all of these CD's that I'm burning for you. I have no problem with doing it but dude, there are 59 CD's that I burned for you. I hope that you listen to them all. I have to get ready for mine and Kelly's night out. I don't know where we are going or what we are doing but I don't have a problem with any of it.

then you ask from your cask, " Is there life after birth?"
what you saw can mean hell on this earth

Now you live inside a bottle 
the reaper's traveling at full throttle
It's catching you, but you can't see
the reaper's you and the reaper is me

Breaking laws, knocking doors, but there's no one at home
made your bed, rest your head, but you lie there and moan
where to hide, suicide is the only way out
don't you know what it's really about

Wine is fine, but whiskey's quicker
suicide is slow with liquor
take a bottle, drown your sorrows
then it floods away tomorrows

    Nobody freak out. Yes, I have a bottle of whiskey, and Yes, I do feel that way sometimes. But If you really know who I am You would see that this is just talk. I say again " nobody freak out.
